title: Hour 2 - Chris Berman and Joe Thomas (12-05-19)

description:
Dan And The Danettes welcome ESPN “NFL Primetime” co-host Chris Berman and NFL Network analyst Joe Thomas.  Thank you to today's sponsors: Geico = Visit Geico.com. In just 15 minutes you could save 15% or more on car insurance.   Theragun = Eliviate pain with this percussive therapy device, use promo code dpshow10 to get 2 free attachments. Find out more at www.theragun.com/dpshow10  Zoro = Make your life easier, find everything you need for your business at www.zoro.com/dan and get 15% off your first order when you sign up for Z mail. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
